original_text: There is also the land of the Gebalites, and all of Lebanon in the east. That land goes from Baal Gad at the side of Hermon mountain, to Lebo-Hamath.
korean_text: 또 그발 족속의 땅과 해 뜨는 곳의 온 레바논 곧 헤르몬 산 아래 바알갓에서부터 하맛에 들어가는 곳까지와

sentences.original_text: There is also the land of the Gebalites
and all of Lebanon in the east
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 동쪽에 있는 레바논 전부가 있습니다

sentences.original_text: That land goes from Baal Gad
at the side of Hermon mountain
